posts.extended: RT @Babyballs69: There should be an app that translates all normal human English into NYPostspeak.

posts.description: I love Anil, but... on Twitter: "@agolis @kevinroose @mikeisaac first rule of content management: there is no god we all die alone"
posts.extended: RT @anildash: Remember the first rule of content management systems: There is no god, we all die alone.

posts.description: I love Anil, but... on Twitter: "It's odd that media companies spend millions on content management systems yet don't understand they are the embodiment of revenue strategy."
posts.extended: RT @anildash: Fifth rule of CMS: The CMS is the embodiment of a digital publisher's revenue strategy.
